item.name: Returns the GET request's data. Accepts any query parameters and any headers.

request.name: Returns the GET request's data. Accepts any query parameters and any headers.

query.description:
Enter free-form query parameters in the JSON format `{ "param1": "value1", "param2": "value2", ... }`.

Note that the parameters will be actually sent as `?param1=value1&param2=value2&...`

item.name: Returns the DELETE request's data. Accepts any query parameters and any headers.

request.name: Returns the DELETE request's data. Accepts any query parameters and any headers.

Note that the parameters will be actually sent as `?param1=value1&param2=value2&...`

urlencoded.description: Pizza size (This can only be one of small,medium,large)

description.content: Pizza size (This can only be one of small,medium,large)

urlencoded.value: Ring the door bell three times

variable.description: (Required) Username. Use the same username in the path AND for authorization.
(Required) Password. Use the same password in the path AND for authorization.

response.name: Unauthorized (The username and password used for Basic auth do not match those in the URL path.)

description.content: Returns 404 Not Found unless the request is authenticated.

variable.description: (Required) Username. Use the same username in the path AND for authorization.

response.name: Unautorized (the username and password used for Basic auth do not match those in the URL path.)

variable.description: (Required) The status code to return, or a weighted list of statuses to pick from, such as `200:4,500:0.3,418`.

response.name: A response with the requested status code.
